title: Despicable Me 720p AVCHD DTS Multisubs Lilmjkl
description:
Information

Genre(S)			: Animation/Comedy
Director(s)			: Pierre Coffin And Chris Renaud
Cast				: Steve Carell, Jason Segel and Russell Brand

Plot:

In a happy suburban neighborhood surrounded by white picket fences with flowering rose bushes, sits a black house with a dead lawn. Unbeknownst to the neighbors, hidden beneath this home is a vast secret hideout. Surrounded by a small army of minions, we discover Gru, planning the biggest heist in the history of the world. He is going to steal the moon. (Yes, the moon!) Gru delights in all things wicked. Armed with his arsenal of shrink rays, freeze rays, and battle-ready vehicles for land and air, he vanquishes all who stand in his way. Until the day he encounters the immense will of three little orphaned girls who look at him and see something that no one else has ever seen: a potential Dad. The world\'s greatest villain has just met his greatest challenge: three little girls named Margo, Edith and Agnes.

How to Play:

when playing on a AVCHD compatible Blu-Ray player or playstation 3.

	Now insert a blank DVDÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â±R or a DVDÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â±RW, make sure the importand files

	When everything is done you can insert the disc in your AVCHD

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

When playing on a computer with AVCHD compatible software like PowerDVD 10.

	When you want to play your movie from a DVD follow the steps in the
	tutorial above for playing on a AVCHD compitable Player.

	if you want to play your movie in a virtual optical drive like 
	Daemon tools mount the .mds file in your program, not the .iso cause
	it won\'t play your movie and will say that your drive is incapable.

	Play the the disc, when the \"what to do\" screen apears, with your
	AVCHD compatible software.
